author: GameSpot
description:
Is Tales of The Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game worth playing? Resident Tolkien fan Lucy was sorely disappointed by the gameplay loop, bugs, and crashes. 

The game had a tumultuous development cycle, to learn more, check out Jackson Ryan's piece on The Verge: https://www.theverge.com/games/709797/tales-of-the-shire-lotr-development-weta-workshop
title: I Was (Sadly) Right About Tales of The Shire
